user.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-traeger/issues

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Traeger is allowed.

set_temp.name: Set Temp
set_temp.description: Set Grill Temp.____________________________Only up to your grill's MaxTemp.

smoke.name: Set S.Smoke Mode
smoke.description: Set Smoke Mode 1 or 0._________________________Only Avail if grill supports

use_timer.name: Use Timer
use_timer.description: Use Timer to Advance State._________________*Only applies to current state.

min_delta.name: Min Probe/Grill Delta
min_delta.description: Min DELTA temp between Grill and Probe.___*Requires `max_grill_delta_temp`.

max_grill_delta_temp.name: Max Grill Set.Temp for Delta
max_grill_delta_temp.description: Max Temp it will increase to from probe `min_delta`. *Requires `min_delta`.

act_temp_adv.name: Actual Grill Temp for Advance
act_temp_adv.description: Grill Temp at which the State will advance.

probe_act_temp_adv.name: Actual Probe Temp for Advance
probe_act_temp_adv.description: Probe Temp at which the State will advance.
